text.content:
Crushed Toe

Normal damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: -10-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-10-foot status penalty to your land Speed}. Both effects last until healed.

Bludgeoning

Stinger

Normal damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 3}.

Piercing

Missing Digits

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target loses [[/r 1d4#Lost Fingers]] fingers on one hand and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Regenerate] spell or similar effect.

Slashing

Strange Goo

Normal damage and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained], using your class DC as the DC to Escape.

Bomb or Spell
